sentences.english: The influence of double_percolation phenomenon on shielding effectiveness of the rubber was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 結合二次滲濾現象，分析了其對屏蔽性能的影響。

sentences.english: Clogging problem is often met in wastewater infiltration land treating systems.
sentences.chinese: 堵塞問題是污水滲濾土地處理系統經常遇到的。

sentences.english: We make coffee in a percolator at home.
sentences.chinese: 我們在家用咖啡滲濾壺製作咖啡。

sentences.english: Pilot study was carried out on the evaluation method for filtration property of non-filtration drilling fluid.
sentences.chinese: 對評價無滲透鑽井液滲濾性能的方法進行了初步探討。

sentences.english: The mechanical strength of calcined briquet can meet the needs of percolation leaching operation.
sentences.chinese: 焙燒球料的機械強度也能滿足滲濾浸出操作要求。

sentences.english: A test project of the subsurface soil infiltration system for rural domestic sewage treatment is built.
sentences.chinese: 建設地下土壤滲濾系統處理農村生活污水試驗工程。

sentences.english: Rationally alternate wetting and drying are good for keeping a high infiltration rate.
sentences.chinese: 合理的乾溼交替有助於維持較高的滲濾速率。

sentences.english: Jean broke the silex last week, so I have no choice but to cook it with the pan.
sentences.chinese: 吉恩上星期把滲濾壺打碎了，所以我只能用鍋來煮。

sentences.english: Analyzing the factors that influence the water quantity.
sentences.chinese: 對滲濾取水的取水量影響因素分析。

sentences.english: This corresponds to the percolation phase of the drying mechanism .
sentences.chinese: 這相當於幹化機理的滲濾階段。

sentences.english: Land infiltration systems have an effective treatment on pollutants.
sentences.chinese: 土地毛管滲濾系統對生活污水具有較好的處理效果。

sentences.english: Jean broke the Silex last week, so I'm still boiling it.
sentences.chinese: 吉恩上星期把滲濾壺打碎了，所以我只能用鍋煮咖啡。

sentences.english: The influence of double percolation phenomenon on shielding effectiveness of rubber was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 結合二次滲濾現象，分析了其對屏蔽性能的影響。

sentences.english: The uniformity of conductive function was better once the percolation phenomena occurred.
sentences.chinese: 形成滲濾效應之後，導電功能的均勻性較好。
